entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023
